short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FixYT removes the dislike and replaces the like button with a heart symbol and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FixYT is an chrome extension that removes the YouTube dislike button entirely and replaces the like button with a heart symbol (like Instagram). And its makes the YT UI a bit more how it ones was...
